alert.note: Alert for Cape Fairweather to Lisianski Strait; City and Borough of Yakutat; Glacier Bay (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 07 at 2:44PM AKDT by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...CONFIDENCE INCREASING FOR HEAVY RAIN THROUGH SATURDAY NIGHT... A front over the eastern Gulf of Alaska will stall on the outer coast this evening. A second front with atmospheric river characteristics will merge with the first and shift west before stalling once again, this time over the northeast Gulf Coast. Heaviest rain totals through Friday night will be located over Glacier Bay National Park and coastal areas from Dry Bay to Icy Bay with rainfall rates increasing Friday morning. A third front will enter the western Gulf of Alaska Saturday evening and begin to impact most of Southeast Alaska with more heavy rain possible as early as Monday morning.

area.areaDesc: Cape Fairweather to Lisianski Strait; City and Borough of Yakutat; Glacier Bay
